sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect,useState} from "react"; import movies from "../movies" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import Booking from "./Booking" function Details(){ const params=useParams() const userId=params.userId const obj=movies.find(function(num){ return num.title===userId }) const [movie,setmovieData]=useState(null) const [found,setNotFound]=useState(null); useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://www.omdbapi.com/?t={}&apikey=961ea94b`) .then((res) => res.json() .then(data => console.log(data)) ) }, []) return ( <>

{obj.title}

{obj.genre}

Cost

) } export default Details;
